messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Space Station 13.

We have sent the most valuable item in existence to your heavy storage Vault.

Protect it at all costs. Many of your enemies will kill to get it.

The fate of the universe is in your hands.

Protect The Fappening 2.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
The Fappening 2 is now in the vault. 

Please secure it.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Do not call the shuttle. You must protect the FAPPENING 2.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
WARNING: The Fappening 2 is no longer in the vault.

You are to secure it, or risk a Delta-Level Security Protocol.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
WARNING: 10 minutes to Delta Protocol.

Return the Fappening 2 to the Vault for cancellation.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Delta Protocol postponed due to arrival of Response Team.

Delta Protocol will activaye in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Vault Security compromised. 

Transport of The Fappening 2 off station needed.

Does your station request a shuttle?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Failure to bring The Fappening 2 aboard the Escape Shuttle will result in termination.
